description: The KSD Portfolio includes projects funded under various initiatives.
full_summary:
### Provision of Monitoring Services for the Health and SRHR Portfolio
#### Project Background
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is seeking a consulting team to provide monitoring services for the Health and SRHR Portfolio, funded by the Canadian Partnerships for Social Development Bureau (KSD). This portfolio includes projects funded under various initiatives.

#### Tender Information
* **Reference Number:** cb-232-66862768
* **Solicitation Number:** 24-244513
* **Publication Date:** 2023-11-29
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-08 14:00:00
* **Amendment Number:** 4

#### Bidding Information
* **Notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

#### Trade Agreements
Bidders are advised that this procurement is open to suppliers who have the capacity to meet the trade agreement requirements. Suppliers are expected to refer to the trade agreements listed below:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

#### Conditions to Participate
To participate in this procurement, bidders are required to contact the contracting authority to confirm their eligibility and confirm their interest in participating in this procurement. Only one contract will be awarded.

#### Contact Information
For more information on this procurement, please contact:
* Name: Isabelle Doray
* Email: isabelle.doray@international.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 551-0084

You can download the tender documents at the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/25823/npp-24-244513-ksd\_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/25823/npp-24-244513-ksd\_0.pdf)
